jobs.name: uxebu
jobs.jobDescription: I co-founded uxebu with two colleagues, we hired our first employee one year later. We shaped the JavaScript landscape very early on, ran events and hired top devs, who later went to Microsoft, Mozilla, Facebook, etc. We built JavaScript apps for various devices, all with web technologies. Initially people were skeptic, but we started in JavaScript as (one of) the first companies that did only JavaScript.
jobs.nonTechSkills: Founder, Employer, Sales, Marketing, all things a founder does
